home.RegisterDesc: Create your account to become a part of Pebble’s volunteer network.
home.AttendeDesc: Browse events and join them! You can sort by date and location
home.OrganizeyourownDesc: Got a brilliant idea you want to pursue with others? Organize your own event!
home.goals: These goals, also known as the SDGs, aim to end poverty, protect the planet and ensure prosperity for everyone by 2030
home.volunteersQu1: Pebble Work is great at connecting me with other young individuals who share my desire to work for a good cause.
home.volunteersQu2: Pebble Work is incredibly important in getting people involved with the Sustainable Development Goals.
home.volunteersQu3: There is usually an event at Pebble Work that I am eager to attend. If not, I can always start one on my own!
home.Becomethechangeyouwishtoseeintheworld: Become the change you wish to see in the world
home.Doeverythingyoucantocreateanamazing,insp: Do everything you can to create an amazing, inspiring experience in the world

hiro.title: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much
hiro.describtion: Volunteering events gives you the opportunity to make a positive impact on the world and the lives of others. So, if you want to make a difference and be a part of something bigger than yourself, join or organize events today!

aboutPage.title: About Pebble Work
aboutPage.describtion: Pebble Work is a platform where you can discover and launch neighborhood movements and get-togethers in support of one or more of the 17 Sustainable Development Goals. To improve the world, we assemble committed individuals. We become more enthusiastic about what we do as our community expands.
aboutPage.techDesc: HTML, JavaScript, ReactJS, NextJS, npm - Testing: Jest -  Formatting: Prettier, ESLint - Styling:TailwindCSS - Translation: i18next - Version control: git, GitHub
